about_the_game: Once it's all over, Chun-Lan and Katie are still going at it hard, and Jack flees to the streets. Unfortunately for him, the twins are lying in wait to snatch him up and bring him back up to a room. Seeing how tired Jack looks, they decide to "lift his spirits".

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
Content Warning:"Waifu fighter - F-ist & Flirtatious: Ch.2 Esoteric Ninja Arts" contains non-consensual sex and blowjob.

short_description: The Tourney of Supreme Warriors has ended, and the six most powerful female warriors have been laid to waste by Jack Hoff's mighty trousers. Thus, they've conspired to ambush him, and exact their revenge. Will the goddess that smiles upon him be the goddess of victory... or fertility?
